lead_paragraph: Banco Sabadell would acquire 50 percent of the British lender’s outstanding shares from the Lloyds Banking Group, which spun off TSB last year.

headline.main: TSB to Recommend That Investors Accept Spanish Bank’s Takeover Offer
headline.print_headline: TSB to Recommend That Investors Accept Spanish Bank’s Takeover Offer

snippet: Banco Sabadell would acquire 50 percent of the British lender’s outstanding shares from the Lloyds Banking Group, which spun off TSB last year.
